text: What are you waiting for, darling? The officer is obviously thirsty." John fought back his inherited desire to snub the man. If he did he would have to leave the bar and either sit in the lounge or return to his bedroom. Seaweed sensed his embarrassment and came to the rescue."You haven't introduced yourself," she said with mock severity.
